insert into tb_alarm (f_isAlarm, f_centerNo, f_deviceNo, f_pressure, f_crtTime, f_sendTime, f_state, f_toTelephone) values
(#{item.isAlarm}, #{item.centerNo}, #{item.deviceNo}, #{item.pressure}, #{item.crtTime}, #{item.sendTime}, #{item.state}, #{item.toTelephone})
mapper.update:
update tb_alarm
f_id = #{obj.id}, f_id = null,
f_isAlarm = #{obj.isAlarm}, f_isAlarm = null,
f_centerNo = #{obj.centerNo}, f_centerNo = null,
f_deviceNo = #{obj.deviceNo}, f_deviceNo = null,
f_pressure = #{obj.pressure}, f_pressure = null,
f_crtTime = #{obj.crtTime}, f_crtTime = null,
f_sendTime = #{obj.sendTime}, f_sendTime = null,
f_state = #{obj.state}, f_state = null,
f_toTelephone = #{obj.toTelephone}, f_toTelephone = null,
and f_id = #{tag.id} and f_id is null
and f_isAlarm = #{tag.isAlarm} and f_isAlarm is null
and f_centerNo = #{tag.centerNo} and f_centerNo is null
and f_deviceNo = #{tag.deviceNo} and f_deviceNo is null
and f_pressure = #{tag.pressure} and f_pressure is null
and f_crtTime = #{tag.crtTime} and f_crtTime is null
and f_sendTime = #{tag.sendTime} and f_sendTime is null
and f_state = #{tag.state} and f_state is null
and f_toTelephone = #{tag.toTelephone} and f_toTelephone is null
